title: Sepp Kuss is a bigger star in Spain than in the US, but a Vuelta a España win could change that
content:
The Colorado climber is already a top draw in Europe, will a grand tour victory boost his profile at home? 'It's nice to see the reaction from the US.'

Read the full article at Sepp Kuss is a bigger star in Spain than in the US, but a Vuelta a España win could change that on Velo.
author: ahood
